svg.title: Speech Articulator: Animated Speech Articulation Guide
svg.desc: An animated multimedia guide to the formation of sounds in natural human languages, version 1.5. Based on data from `An Introduction to Phonetics and Phonology` (2nd ed.) by Clark and Yallop. This application was created by Doug Schepers (doug@schepers.cc) for use in SVG-based linguistics applications.
svg.metadata:
